item.title: v108 : Mahtnan Gear
item.description: Mahtnan gear is the new gear set added v108, as part of a new season of TERA, namedly TERA : AWAKE. Mahtnan gear differentiates itself from the previous Kaia’s Soul gear set by removing damage on enchant, and Infusion options. This makes it one of the easiest gear set to enchant due to the removal of artificial enchanting difficulty, but other factors have been added to make Mahtnan gear just as problematic as it was before.
